title: Your goddamn bugsplat
body: And your servers both need a fix. I've been thrown out of the loading screen through bugsplat crashes enough times to be thrown into low priority matchmaking now. The only modes I can play without fear of being crashed is bots and it's not all that fun when you want to do teambuilder x.x Riot seriously pull yourselves together, this shit only happens during teambuilder and 5's whenever its up but no crashes whatsoever when its just 5's and 3's

replies.body:
Bug-splat was created to give the user an explanation as to what just happened, instead of just closing the application(s). It's not the cause of it.

Have you tried reinstalling League? It's the most likely way to fix your issue.
